utterance.speaker: RACH
utterance.content: Joey, would you slow down? They're not gonna be sold out of papers at one o'clock in the morning.

utterance.content: I'm excited! I've never gotten reviewed before.

utterance.content: You were so amazing as the king. I was really impressed, I was.

utterance.content: Although, you know what? You might want to consider wearing underwear next time. Yeah, cause when you sat down on your throne you could kind of see your... royal subject.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Here it is, here it is. The only thing worse than the mindless, adolescent direction was Joseph Tribbiani's disturbingly unskilled portrayal of the king.

utterance.speaker: PHOE
utterance.content: OK. The only thing worse than the mindless, adolescent direction...

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.content: Maybe they do. I've been doin' this ten years and I haven't gotten anywhere. There's gotta be a reason.

utterance.content: No, no, no, it.. it's too hard. It's not worth it. I quit.

utterance.content: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait one minute. Wait a minute. I believe this will change your mind. In a mediocre play, Joseph Tribbiana was able to achieve brilliant new levels of... continued on page 153... sucking.

utterance.content: OK, look, this isn't the first time somebody's said something to me about this, but, I don't know... I always made excuses about it, like... uhhh... 'I'm just a social drinker,' or, 'C'mon, it's Flag Day.'

utterance.content: I think you may have a drinking problem.

utterance.content: What these? Oh, these are, um, for.. cuts and scrapes.

utterance.speaker: FBOB
utterance.content: Look, I am just not strong enough to be in a codependent relationship right now, OK?

utterance.speaker: MNCA
utterance.content: Oh... shoot.

utterance.speaker: FBOB
utterance.content: Well, anyway, I hope we can be friends.

utterance.speaker: MNCA
utterance.content: OK.

utterance.speaker: MNCA
utterance.content: Take care.

utterance.speaker: FBOB
utterance.content: You too.

utterance.speaker: RACH
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: MNCA
utterance.content: Well we... we kinda broke up.

utterance.speaker: GANG
utterance.content: Awwwwwwww.

utterance.speaker: MNCA
utterance.content: Does anybody want these?

utterance.speaker: CHAN
utterance.content: I'll take one. Sometimes I like to hold stuff like this and pretend I'm a giant.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: GANG
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: How'd the callback go?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: It was unbelievable! I walked in there and she was all over me.

utterance.speaker: CHAN
utterance.content: So what'd you do?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Well, I couldn't do it. I told her I didn't want to get the part that way.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Good for you.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: But wait, wait, wait. Then, after I left her office, she caught up with me at the elevator and offered me an even bigger part.

utterance.speaker: PHOE
utterance.content: So... and?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Soooooo... you are now looking at Dr. Drake Ramore, neurosurgeon, recurring in at least four episodes!

utterance.speaker: GANG
utterance.content: Allright!

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Alright... I've got to go shower.

utterance.speaker: RUSS
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: CHAN
utterance.content: Oh, hey.

utterance.speaker: PHOE
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: RUSS
utterance.content: I guess you guys heard, Rachel dumped me.

utterance.speaker: CHAN
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm sorry man.

utterance.speaker: RUSS
utterance.content: Oh, all she said was that I remind her too much of somebody. You have any idea who she's talking about?

utterance.speaker: PHOE
utterance.content: Oh I do, it's.... it's Bob Saget. She hates him.

utterance.speaker: RUSS
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: CHAN
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: PHOE
utterance.content: Hey, Julie! Hey, how are you doing?

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: Um, oh, I don't know. I mean, it's definitely weird not being with Ross, but I guess I'm doing OK. Actually I've got some of his stuff that he, um....
